about_the_game:
Step into Oblivion's Gate

Are you ready to test your reflexes, strategy, and instincts in a world where light is your greatest enemy? Into Oblivion's Gate is a thrilling maze survival game that challenges you to navigate through treacherous levels filled with unique obstacles and deadly traps. Every step could mean survival or disaster — can you outwit the darkness and escape?

Gameplay Features:

  • Shadow Survival Mechanics: Avoid beams of light that will instantly end your journey. Stay hidden, move smartly, and make every decision count.

  • Challenging Levels: Progress through a variety of levels, each with its own set of dangers, including:

    • Tornadoes that randomly disrupt your path.

    • Invisible walls that materialize without warning.

    • Mazes with multiple doors — only one leads to the next level, while others send you back to the start.

  • Precision Platforming: With simple walk and jump controls, you’ll need sharp timing and quick thinking to avoid falling into the abyss.

  • Dynamic Obstacles: Moving platforms, disappearing floors, and unpredictable traps keep you constantly on edge.

  • Endless Replays: Each attempt presents new opportunities to refine your strategy and discover better paths to victory.

What to Expect:

  • A fast-paced survival game with increasing difficulty as you advance.

  • Immersive soundscapes and minimalistic visuals that heighten the tension and focus on gameplay.

  • Quick, pick-up-and-play sessions perfect for those who love a challenge.

Do you have what it takes to escape the darkness and find your way to freedom? Or will you be consumed by the shadows forever?

name: Oblivion's Gate

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600@ 3.1 GHz or AMD R5 1600X @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or equivalent
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600@ 3.1 GHz or AMD R5 1600X @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or equivalent
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Navigate a world where light is your enemy and shadows are your only refuge. In **Into the Shadows**, avoid deadly beams, survive unpredictable hazards, and find the right path through challenging mazes. Quick reflexes and sharp instincts are your only hope for survival.
